nml_option.name: config_AM_maximumIcePresence_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member maximumIcePresence is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_maximumIcePresence_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_maximumIcePresence_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the maximumIcePresence analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_maximumIcePresence_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_maximumIcePresence_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_maximumIcePresence_start_time
nml_option.description: Time to start accumulating ice domain

package.name: maximumIcePresenceAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the maximumIcePresence analysis member.

var.name: maximumIcePresence
var.description: Maximum extent of sea-ice for the simulation divided by months
